name: mixpost
description: Mixpost is an open-source social media management tool for scheduling and publishing content across multiple platforms. It features content calendars, team collaboration, and a modern web UI for marketing workflows.
features: Multi-platform posting: Schedule and publish content to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn from one interface.
Content calendar: Visualize scheduled posts across all platforms in a calendar view for strategic planning.
Media library: Store and organize images, videos, and other assets for reuse across multiple social posts.
Team collaboration: Assign roles and permissions to team members for content creation, approval, and publishing workflows.
Post scheduling: Queue content for automatic publishing at optimal times based on audience engagement patterns.
Draft management: Save work-in-progress posts and collaborate on content before scheduling for publication.
Analytics tracking: Monitor post performance with engagement metrics and audience insights across platforms.
Hashtag management: Save and organize hashtag sets for consistent branding and improved content discoverability.
